Plainly grateful to be saved, Starstomp felt she owed her saviors.

Starstomp:
Thanks! I... guess I'll be okay. Is your base far? By the way, my name is 
Starstomp, but you must've heard it in my distress message!

>Termitron/Nightlight::
>
>Termitron took in arms Starstomp, while Nighlight said "Be careful,

>
>"I'll be carefull, Your ladyship"
>
>Nighlithgt noticed that Starstomp had regained consciousness"Are you

>you in a cr... all will be ok"
